data.title: Astro-SCRAPPY: Speedy Cosmic Ray Annihilation Package in Python
data.name: astroscrappy
data.description: Speedy Cosmic Ray Annihilation Package in Python

evidence: Owner is the GitHub organization `astropy`, and README states: "This project is Copyright (c) Astropy Developers" indicating community governance under the Astropy project.
"Astro-SCRAPPY is designed to detect cosmic rays in images (numpy arrays)" â€“ a Python package operating on numpy arrays, implying it is imported and used as a library component.

The README describes functionality (cosmic ray detection in images) but provides no installation command via a package manager or mention of releases, implying distribution primarily via the source repository.
